argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dral1.1 | |- ( A. x x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_dral2 | |- ( A. x x = y -> ( A. x ph <-> A. x ps ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_axc11 | |- ( A. x x = y -> ( A. x ps -> A. y ps ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_axc112 | |- ( A. x x = y -> ( A. y ps -> A. x ps ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_impbid | |- ( A. x x = y -> ( A. x ps <-> A. y ps ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_bitrd | |- ( A. x x = y -> ( A. x ph <-> A. y ps ) ) |
\
 Alternate proof of ~ dral1 , shorter but requiring ~ ax-11 . (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-1994.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 22-Apr-2018.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
